review.title: “Do you like work for a a bully, being verbally abused everyday, micro managed to the max?”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly, sympathetic co-workers who have been forced to remain employed here due to tough job market and all privately share their disgust toward the President/Owner. After my experience here I can handle the toughest personality imaginable and has made me stronger and wiser.
review.cons: Cons – President/owner is a micro manager who is unprofessional, verbally abusive and a bully. Very high turn over at all levels. Employees are forced to believe they are incompetent and should be greatful toward the President that he still employs them.me
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
